attributes.action: Dont leave the Eu. I was leave but now I want to remain.(leave voters only)
attributes.additional_details: Led by donkeys show a  Leave UK poster that states "taking back control is a careful change not a sudden change.  Led by Donkeys Facebook page.
attributes.background: The leave campaign stated they would negotiate a deal with the EU. They failed & now want to leave without a deal. Many changed their mind & now want the UK to stay in the the EU. People who sign want you to know this and to RevokeA50 to remain in the EU.
